definition: to offer/to present/to dedicate/to donate/to show/to put on display/worthy person (old)

sentences.english: It is worth noting that the monohydrate is not mentioned in the literature.
sentences.chinese: 值得指出的是，在本文献中没有提到一水化物。

sentences.english: The study appears in the Archives of Internal Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究出现在《内科学文献》中。
《威尔逊》是一部古怪的文献片，于1944年公演。

sentences.english: Totally 99 repeated articles were deleted and 22 were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 排除99篇重复文献，纳入22篇用于综述。

sentences.english: It must have been a work of vast ability in the somniferous school of literature.
sentences.chinese: 那准是一部催眠派文献中卓有功效的作品。

sentences.english: Methods 3 cases of mesonephric adenocarcinoma of the bladder were reviewed with review of the literature.
sentences.chinese: 方法总结3例病人资料，结合文献复习讨论。

sentences.english: The fourth part mainly summarized literature value of "the Liezi Note".
sentences.chinese: 第四部分，主要总结了《列子注》的文献价值。

sentences.english: All references given must be referred to in the main body of the thesis.
sentences.chinese: 所以列出的参考文献必须与论文的主题相关联。

sentences.english: See the documentation for detailed instructions on how to do so.
sentences.chinese: 查看文献以得到关于怎样去做的具体指导信息。

sentences.english: A kind of method for finding matrix image more easily appears in literature.
sentences.chinese: 在一些文献中出现了求解正交表矩阵象的简便方法。

sentences.english: Letters, maps, and pictures are documents.
sentences.chinese: 信件，挂图，图片都是文献。

sentences.english: Controvercies abound in the finance literature concerning leasing.
sentences.chinese: 和租赁有关的金融文献中充满了争议。

sentences.english: Methods Liferatures about celiac axis ligation were reviewed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法收集和回顾有关腹腔干结扎的相关文献。

sentences.english: I spent a few days sampling the literature of social science.
sentences.chinese: 我花了几天时间浏览有关社会科学的文献。

sentences.english: Electronic literature transmis sion service is a complete new mode of literature resources sharing in the inf or-mation era.
sentences.chinese: 电子文献传递是信息社会对文献资源共享的崭新模式。

sentences.english: Electronic literature transmis sion service is a complete new mode of literature resources sharing in the inf or-mation era.
sentences.chinese: 电子文献传递是信息社会对文献资源共享的崭新模式。

definition: paper/treatise/thesis/CL:篇[pian1]/to discuss a paper or thesis (old)
research/a study/CL:項|项[xiang4]/to research/to look into
